text.tspan: Cumulative COâ‚‚ emissions released by wildfires in 2024, World

Carbon dioxide emissions from
wildfires
are measured in tonnes per week. Average is the mean COâ‚‚
emissions over the period from 2012 to 2023. Maximum and minimum are the highest and lowest years.
Data source: Global Wildfire Information System (2025)
Note: The numbers 1 to 52 on the horizontal axis represent the weeks from the start of the year, from 1 for the first week of January to 52 for
